trans-unit.source: Handles the layout of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"></xref>.
The TabPanel serves as an item host for the tab items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: TabPanel 做為項目主機 索引標籤中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: It determines the correct sizing and positioning for tab items and handles the logic for multiple rows of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 它會判斷正確的調整大小和位置 索引標籤項目和控制代碼的多個資料列的邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Arranges and sizes the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 排列和調整大小的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The size that a tab panel assumes to position child elements.
trans-unit.target: 要放置子項目假設的索引標籤面板的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the tab panel.
This method is used to override the default clip behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> base class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來覆寫預設裁剪行為的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>基底類別。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to prevent clipping children because the selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> header renders outside the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 方法的目的是為了防止裁剪子系，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>標頭會轉譯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel>界限之外</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>的選取

trans-unit.source: A size that is the layout size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A 的大小的配置大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TabPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when remeasuring the control is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要重新測量控制項時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method updates the desired size of a tab panel.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會更新所需的大小的索引標籤面板。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the parent <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
Constraint size is an upper limit.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束大小是時間的上限。

trans-unit.source: The return value should not exceed this size.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值不應該超過此大小。
